DOC.brief_summary: The purpose multicenter , prospective , randomized clinical study determine safety effectiveness EYEFILL速 C.-US Viscoelastic patient undergo cataract extraction intraocular lens ( IOL ) implantation surgery . EYEFILL速 C.-US Viscoelastic design create maintain space , protect corneal endothelium intraocular tissue , manipulate tissue surgery . EYEFILL速 C.-US Viscoelastic may also use coat intraocular lenses instrument cataract extraction intraocular lens insertion .
DOC.criteria: Any race Older 21 year Cataract require cataract extraction least 1 eye Clear intraocular medium cataract Able provide write informed consent Able willing comply require followup schedule Competent understand procedure action ask him/her research subject Monocular Ocular infection History glaucoma , Ocular Hypertension ( IOP > 21 mmHg ) likely require IOP lower medication , ocular condition require IOP lower medication , condition prevent reliable Goldmann applanation tonometry , know steroid responder Previous intraocular surgery operative eye Previous serious corneal disease know endothelial cell loss / damage ( operative eye ) History chronic recurrent inflammatory eye disease ( operative eye ) Evidence retinal vascular disease ( operative eye ) Uncontrolled diabetes proliferative diabetic retinopathy Acute chronic disease illness would increase operative risk Allergy anesthetic postoperative medication Known hypersensitivity sodium hyaluronate component viscoelastic Patient clinical trial within 30 day prior start study
